results.title: Fire Away
results.overview: Nominally about attempts to steal a gold mine, the movie starts out with the air of a realistic comedy, then immediately descends into a series of perfectly timed gags which made me goggle at their improbability -- not the sort of thing you normally think of in a slapstick comedy. Very quickly the unerring ability of ropes to loop themselves around tree roots, stopping Al from plummeting to his death or an explosion to drop him on a bull came to make me goggle again.

results.title: Fire Dance
results.overview: Fire poi in elegant slow motion.

results.title: Where the Fire Burns
results.overview: Where the Fire Burns is a road story. Ayse who unexpectedly gets sick is taken for an operation urgently. Her family shows a great solidarity for this operation  to happen. During the operation, it is found out that the girl is fourteen weeks pregnant. After the successful operation Ayse doesn’t tell who the father of her  baby is. The family who tried to ‘‘keep her alive” is now trying to ‘‘kill” her. Osman the father who takes the responsibility to kill her takes a trip with Ayse. While Osman is trying to find a way to poison his daughter, Ayse doesn’t know that she will be killed. This trip of father and daughter continues on getting to know each other and emotion of regret.

results.title: The Fire
results.overview: What happens in the flames of a fire.

results.title: Fire Water
results.overview: Fire Water: Australiaʼs Industrial Fluoridation Disgrace gives a voice to those seldom heard – Australians who know the truth about mandatory water fluoridation and refuse to remain silent. With Australian authorities rapidly moving to fluoridate all remaining areas of the country, the timing of this film could not be more pertinent. It is urgent that the Australian people have the opportunity to hear these viewpoints.

results.title: Magic Fire
results.overview: Director William Dieterle's 1956 film biography of classical composer Richard Wagner stars Carlos Thompson, Yvonne De Carlo, Rita Gam, Alan Badel and Valentina Cortese.

results.title: Fire Creek
results.overview: Spared by a God he didn't believe in, Jason Malek (Seth Packard) survives a sniper attack while serving as a soldier in Afghanistan. However, his best friend, a devoted husband, father and Christian is killed just inches from him.  Critically wounded but alive, Jason returns home to Utah carrying shrapnel wounds in his legs and the age-old question, "Why do bad things happen to good people?" Now, searching for his purpose, the former soldier adjusts to his new day-to-day life and does his best to improve the lives of those who surround him.

results.title: Fire Bugs
results.overview: Bimbo has problems trying to put out a fire that's burning a building to a crisp.

results.title: Holiday Fire
results.overview: Come in from the cold & experience the warmth & comfort of a fireplace on your very own tv. This lets you enjoy a crackling fire without the hassle of smoke or soot. Includes 10 holiday carols.

results.title: Allegro with Fire
results.overview: A heroic story about Soviet sailors fighting Nazis during WWII.

results.title: Father of Four: Home Field Advantage
results.overview: No overview found.

results.title: Back Fire
results.overview: Fat, Fatty and Fatter are seen rescuing their old Ford from the scrap wagon that is hauling it away. And then report to work, where they have a dyspeptic boss. With the help of a monkey they manage to wreck the office.

results.title: The Unforgettable Fire
results.overview: Tells the story of a young student and his spanish journalist  friend who, after being victims of violence, they decide to act and organize a movement through Mexico's internet, but this is mistaken for a terrorist organization.

results.title: Wild Fire
results.overview: Dream Town Development real estate bosses Jack Del Rio and Sy Richards can't convince animal lover Carol Tanner to sell and relocate safari/animal retirement ranch Wild Land, which she runs with younger sister Ballad since their parents died in a plane crash. Jack hires Bradshaw and Roach to release tiger Caesar, after that fails to cause a scandal to start a forest fire and release all animals, after tying up Carol. Ballad's lover, committed Glendora, southern California fire captain Kennedy, and his jumper team try their best to control the fire. Meanwhile young sheriff Drake Donovan and Ballad drug and catch wild animals. The arson is discovered, but the fiends aren't done yet.

results.title: Fire Ball
results.overview: Fire Ball is a 2005 Taiwanese animated feature film made by Wang Film Productions and directed by Wong Tung.

results.title: Ambient Fire
results.overview: Shot in HD! Look, but don’t touch.  Yes, the warmth and beauty of a wood-burning fireplace is mesmerizing. But, all fires and fireplaces are not created equal which is evident from Ambient Fire: The Ultimate Video Fireplace DVD. Visually, the DVD leaves nothing to be desired. It looks spectacular.

results.title: Friendly Fire
results.overview: Stockholm, Sweden is the spot, and you will see the usual suspects doing Trains, Backjumps, Wholecars, Panels, Insides & more of that. The action neavau is high and lots of ill and fresh fatcap styles. Sweden kicks ass again with these: WUFC, SDK, Y2K, MOA, ViM, FUPS, AE, FAME, HiT. Almost 70 minutes of great live actions and rolling trains.

results.title: Fire Cheese
results.overview: Gabby makes good on his pledge to 'be helpful' by assisting the local fire department while they put out a fire. When the chief incapacitates himself by getting Gabby's hat stuck over his head, Gabby takes charge with with disastrous consequences.

results.title: Cross Fire
results.overview: A returning war veteran discovers his mining business is now being run by corrupt businessmen.

results.title: Roaring Fire
results.overview: On his death bed the man who raised Joji reveals that he is not his real father and that Joji’s real parents died tragically in a plane crash. Shortly thereafter Joji goes to Japan is search of his sister and his twin brother Toru. Joji’s quickly finds his sister Chihiro who is now blind and lives with their uncle. Joji one evening accidently over hears his uncle who has ties to the criminal underworld discussing his various illegal operations. Joji ‘s eavesdropping is discovered by his uncle who offers him a chance to join the organization. Joji promptly turns his uncle’s offer down which immediately puts his life in danger.
